meanings.sent1: The stencilled design on the wall was colorful.
meanings.sent2: The artist displayed a stencilled pattern on the table.
meanings.sent3: The stencilled cat on the poster seemed to wink at me.
meanings.sent4: Her stencilled smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The stencilled flowers looked like they were blooming.

meanings.sent1: She stencilled the letters onto the cardboard.
meanings.sent2: The students stencilled their names on the project.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally stencilled his hand while working.
meanings.sent4: The artist stencilled the skyline onto the canvas.
meanings.sent5: They stencilled the logo onto the banner for the event.
